enWisdom: The cornerstone of God-wariness is abandoning lustful desires

Wisdom: رَدُّ الشَّهْوَةِ أَقْضَى لَهَا وَقَضَاؤُهَا أَشَدُّ لَهَا
enWisdom: Repulsing lust is more effective in exterminating it while fulfilling it only makes it more intense
Obeying one’s lust corrupts the faith
Obedience to lust is destruction and disobedience to it is dominion
Vain desire is victorious over the one who is led by his lust

Wisdom: لَيْسَ فِي الْمَعَاصِي أَشَدُّ مِنِ اتِّبَاعِ الشَّهْوَةِ فَلَا تُطِيعُوهَا فَيَشْغَلَكُمْ
enWisdom: There is no sin that is worse than following [one’s] lust, so do not obey it as it will preoccupy you from [the remembrance of] Allah
Multiplication of sins stems from submission to lust
